meanings.definition: A protective helmet worn by construction workers.
meanings.sent1: The construction worker put on his hardhat before starting work.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to always wear your hardhat on the construction site for safety.
meanings.sent3: The hardhat was feeling shy and tried to hide behind the toolbox.
meanings.sent4: Her hardhat was like a shield, protecting her from any falling debris.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow hardhat stood out against the dusty construction site.

meanings.definition: A person who wears a hardhat for safety on a construction site.
meanings.sent1: The hardhat checked the safety equipment to ensure everything was in place.
meanings.sent2: The hardhat guided the new workers on the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The hardhat decided to take a break and enjoy a snack in the shade.
meanings.sent4: She was the hardhat of the group, always looking out for everyone's safety.
meanings.sent5: The hardhat's dedication to safety made them a respected member of the team.
